name: Silicon Museum
description:
PvP and PvE escape puzzle game. 

In Silicon Museum you become a robber hired by an Italian gangster. Your duty is to steal a piece of precious silicon out of a museum full of cops. You must get the keys to open the door and escape with ther silicon without the guards noticing you. 

There are 3 PvE levels with increasing difficulty, the last one being extremely hard, and a PvP arena where you can battle a friend to see who is the better robber. 

Good luck in the museum.
